data.event: The area was first settled in 1804.
The town of Portland was founded in 1813 from the town of Chautauqua.
A genealogical history of Portland was published in 1873 by Dr. H. C. Taylor, titled Historical Sketches of the Town of Portland, New York.

event.title: was created for this book by Agnes Lee Mitchell in 1989

data.event: An all names index was created for this book by Agnes Lee Mitchell in 1989 and published by the Chautauqua County Genealogical Society.
